content.13: And the man waxed great, and went forward, and grew until he became very great:
content.14: For he had possession of flocks, and possession of herds, and great store of servants: and the Philistines envied him.
content.15: For all the wells which his father’s servants had digged in the days of Abraham his father, the Philistines had stopped them, and filled them with earth.
content.16: And Abimelech said unto Isaac, Go from us; for thou art much mightier than we.
content.17: And Isaac departed thence, and pitched his tent in the valley of Gerar, and dwelt there.
content.18: And Isaac digged again the wells of water, which they had digged in the days of Abraham his father; for the Philistines had stopped them after the death of Abraham: and he called their names after the names by which his father had called them.
content.19: And Isaac’s servants digged in the valley, and found there a well of springing water.
